But when I got the app, I was absolutely FLABBERGASTED!!!!!!!! Frightening images of Kermit the frog and headless baby dolls, pictured in extremely exposed and un inviting colors were all that I could see on the app. Anyways, I think Iâ€™ll have to vote for Kanye now
